name: Google Music May 2015 Update - Fixed
description:
Google's recent update to the web UI for Google Music is horrendous. I've written this style to get rid of various annoyances and make it a little more bearable. 

If you have any suggestions for future updates please let me know. No amount of CSS will fix this.
additional_info:
1.1
- Track duration now maintains visibility. in the player bar. 
- Widened the album/playlist tracklist container. 
- Widened settings cards

1.0
- De-rounded the artist cards
- Removed large margin at the top of some albums
